title: Fun, Clean and True...
review: I'll Preface this all by saying, I am too young to have seen the original game, but have grown up with hockey in the family. I went into this expecting a very, shall I say, Disney-esque rendition of the whole thing, but it was much better than I originally anticipated... The movie completely captured the energy of the era on and off the ice and kept the situations true to life. This was really fun and IMHO def. worth the $$$ spent...
